articles.title: Lenny Henry's daughter, 28, posed as him in fake email - Daily Mail
articles.description: Billie Henry, of Plymouth, Devon, sent emails pretending to be her father, seemingly offering victim Samuel King money to save him from eviction in an attempt to gain his sympathy, a court heard.
articles.content:
